targets.query:
from(bucket: "Tester") 
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperatura") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["planta"] == "${cultivos}") 
  |> group(columns: ["finca"], mode:"by") 
  |> mean(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "Tester") 
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "precipitacion") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["planta"] == "${cultivos}") 
  |> group(columns: ["finca"], mode:"by") 
  |> mean(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "Tester") 
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "humedad") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["planta"] == "${cultivos}") 
  |> group(columns: ["finca"], mode:"by") 
  |> mean(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "Tester") 
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "uv") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["planta"] == "${cultivos}") 
  |> group(columns: ["finca"], mode:"by") 
  |> mean(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "Tester")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["planta"] == "${cultivos}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["finca"] == "${fincas}")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"], mode: "by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Estado del Cultivo en la finca ${fincas}

targets.query:
from(bucket: "Tester")
  |> range(start: -30d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperatura")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["finca"] == "${fincas}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Tester")
  |> range(start: -30d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "precipitacion")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["finca"] == "${fincas}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> range(start: -30d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "humedad")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["finca"] == "${fincas}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Tester")
  |> range(start: -30d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "radiacion")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["finca"] == "${fincas}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Tester")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "radiacion")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["finca"] == "${fincas}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Tester")
  |> range(start: -30d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["finca"] == "${fincas}")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["id_sensor","latitud","longitud"], mode:"by")
  |> mean(column: "valor")
  |> rename(columns: {valor: "metrica", id_sensor: "name"})

from(bucket: "Tester")
  |> range(start: -30d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${medidas}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}" and 
  r["planta"] == "${cultivos}" and
  r["finca"] == "${fincas}")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["id_sensor","latitud","longitud"], mode:"by")
  |> mean(column: "valor")
  |> rename(columns: {valor: "metrica", id_sensor: "name", latitud: "latitud", longitud:"longitud"})

from(bucket: "Tester")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${medidas}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["planta"] == "${cultivos}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["finca"] == "${fincas}" or 
  r["finca"] == "${fincas2}")
  |> group(columns: ["finca"], mode:"by")
  |> mean(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "Tester")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${medidas}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["finca"] == "${fincas}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["planta"] == "${cultivos}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id_sensor"] == "${sensor}" or
  r["id_sensor"] == "${sensor2}")
  |> group(columns: ["id_sensor"], mode:"by")
  |> mean(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "Tester")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "radiacion")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["finca"] == "${fincas}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.measurementTagValues(
    bucket: "Tester",
    tag: "planta",
    measurement: "temperatura",
)
list.description: Listado de cultivos en el bucket seleccionado
list.name: cultivos
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.measurementTagValues(
    bucket: "Tester",
    tag: "planta",
    measurement: "temperatura",
)

list.description: Listado de fincas que tienen el cultivo
list.name: fincas

list.description: Listado de fincas que tienen el cultivo
list.name: fincas2

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema" 

schema.tagValues( 
  bucket: "Tester", 
  tag: "id_sensor",
  predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${medidas}" and 
  r["planta"] == "${cultivos}" and 
  r["finca"] == "${fincas}" and 
  r["usuario"] == "${usuarios}", 
  start: -30d 
)
list.name: sensor
